name: SoleSurvivor
description:
SoleSurvivor is an open-world cooperative sandbox game for single and multiplayer. Players will experience the zombie apocalypse, players will have to deal with it to survive amid difficulties such as finding resources, water and food, environmental and climate threats, saving hostages,: wild animals, other armed survivors. through a city in search of supplies, weapons, airdrops and building materials. Choose your fights against other survivors or zombies you find and progress through the game to build your own shelter and attack your enemies. Play in first or third person with a fully customized male or female character.

Game features:

• Fishing
• Hunting.
• Base Building.
• Save Hostages
• Create items.
• Day/Night Cycle
• Weather cycle.
• 4x4km map.
• Vehicles
• Gather resources.
• Mining and refining ores.
• Airdrops.
• Food and Thirst Management.
• Cooking.
• PvP.
• Groups and Guilds.
